Guys, I use CodeTracking in my code, and I want to simplify:
I have:
```res = @code_expr myfn()
res !== nothing ? res : Meta.parse(@code_string myfn())```
I want to have it in one line:
`@code_expr_easy myfn()`
So I defined this:
```macro code_expr_easy(ex)
  esc(quote
    res = @code_expr $ex
    res !== nothing ? res : Meta.parse(@code_string $ex)
  end)
end```
```What works in files where using CodeTracking is used, but in other cases I get the error @code_expr not defined```
UndefVarError: @code_expr not defined

So I changed @code_expr to $@code_expr but it is not working.
So the question is, how to interpolate macro into a macro?
